name: QUARKS (Bastinus Rex)
description:
I made this game for TRIJAM 162 : It's All Connected

I failed to make it in 3 hours, I made it in 8h approximately !

I started by polishing the visuals (bad idea but I love to do that, no regret)

At first the idea of the gameplay seemed good, but in reality you just smash your button to win ! I thought about add scoring depending on how much you click, but it was like putting perfume on a shit
